text: The Bangladeshi Horse (Bengali: বাংলাদেশের স্থানীয় ঘোড়া) is a breed of horse native to Bangladesh, attached to the group of ponies of Southeast Asia. This small thin animal is used for all kinds of daily survival tasks, involving transport and agricultural traction. There is a smaller variety, named "Pony of Rajshahi". Forming the only indigenous horse in Bangladesh. Category:Horse breeds
title: Bangladeshi native horse
